mapper.select: SELECT video_pk_id as videoPkId, video_one_id as videoOneId, video_one_url as videoOneUrl, video_two_id as videoTwoId, video_two_url as videoTwoUrl, begin_time as beginTime, end_time as endTime, state, create_time as createTime, create_man as createMan, modify_time as modifyTime, modify_man as modifyMan, remark FROM `bu_video_pk_activity` WHERE end_Time < NOW() and state=1
